text:
Oscar Insurance is a healthcare startup using technology, data & design to change the way people find and access care. We are disrupting the healthcare industry by putting people first, not business and cost. www.hioscar.com

We're currently hiring for a variety of Full-time/Onsite roles here in our New York City location. Our interview process consists of a technical phone interview (via Coderpad) and one onsite interview.

Oscar was recently valued at $2.7 Billion following a $400 million investment by Fidelity.
